page.title: 10DALRY KARATE CLUBS
page.content: There are two clubs, one at Roche with about 40 members and one at Dalry Primary with about 100. Most train three times a week. Roche have four "black belts," Dalry Primary, eleven.Every three months there is a grading when you learn some basic blocks and move on to a kata then some fighting.If you pass , you move up to a higher belt. The belts are white, yellow, green, purple, purple and white, brown, brown and white, black, and then you are a master. We need more adults to help us set up leisure activities. I feel that, with unemployment increasing, how to use free time is vitally important. If young people cannot find something constructive to do, they will find something destructive. Some of my friends, with nothing to do, hang about and get into trouble.
